rooms.name: entrance hall
rooms.description: Small foyer with central reception area, natural light ingress through large North-facing windows, ensuring good ventilation. Aligns with Vastu principles for a positive entrance environment.

rooms.name: living room
rooms.description: Spacious living area adjacent to the courtyard. Large windows and sliding glass doors that open onto the courtyard enhance natural light and air circulation.

rooms.name: kitchen
rooms.description: Functional kitchen space placed in the East or Northeast section of the ground floor per Vastu recommendations, ensuring a bright atmosphere with ample ventilation.

rooms.name: bedroom
rooms.description: Comfortable single bedroom located on the North side for peaceful sleep and natural light; windows are designed to allow optimal airflow and energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.

rooms.name: storage
rooms.description: Additional storage area near the kitchen or entrance hall. Can be used for utilities and farm equipment, ensuring easy access with proper ventilation.

openings.description: Main entry door located on the north side of the plot for a positive energy flow as per Vastu, providing natural light and enhanced ventilation.
Strategically placed windows across living spaces, bedrooms, and kitchen to enhance cross ventilation and maximize daylight. Window design is consistent with sustainable building practices.

Open space that acts as the central courtyard, allowing natural light and breezes into all rooms around it. Provides a communal area for relaxation and social interaction while ensuring privacy by proper landscaping.
